label: Breathing Apparatus
description: Equipment to ensure a sophont has breathable air in different environments.

label: Computers
description: Devices that provide the ability to store and process information.

label: Construction Materials
description: Construction materials for the creation of a variety of structures and equipment.

label: Emitters
description: Electronic devices capable of transmitting a signal.

label: Explosives
description: Reactive substances that can be made to explode.

label: Food & Drinks
description: A variety of food and beverage items.

label: Protections
description: Equipment to provide protection against hostile environments

label: Armor
description: Protective gear designed for the dangerous environment of combat.

label: Dress
description: A collection of powered military-style armor

label: Suits
description: A collection of unpowered morphic coverings.

label: Powered Armor
description: Powered exoskeletal suits that augment the soldier's physical abilities and protection.

label: Robots
description: A collection of autonomous and semi-autonomous machines.

label: Automatons
description: Sophont-like machinesthat perform a specific function.

label: Strangeforms
description: Oddly shaped automous and semi-autonomous machines.

label: Sensory Aids
description: A collection of equipment to enhance the sophont's senses.

label: Small Craft
description: All manner of small support craft.

label: Melee Weapons
description: A collection of clubs and other miscellaneous melee weapons

label: Pistols, Revolvers
description: A collection of pistols and revolvers

label: Rifles, Carbines
description: A collection of rifles and carbines

label: Heavy Weapons
description: A collection of cannons, autocannons, gatling guns, and guns
